title: Popcorn (Tomato)
description: Sweet, tangy tomatoes give our healthy snack a mouth-watering taste.

title: Popcorn (Pizza)
description: Best of both worlds! An interesting combination of pizza flavor in popcorn.

title: Popcorn (Better Salted)
description: Popcorn and good times go hand-in-hand. An all-time favorite snack in buttery flavor.

title: Popcorn (Salted)
description: Packed fresh and ready to eat. Tossed in salt and baked to perfection.

title: Mast Mazaa
description: Taste, quality and hygiene packed in Mast Mazaa Masala Munch. With rice flour and Indian spices.

title: Penne Pasta
description: The yummy taste of pasta that now comes in the form of crunchy snacks.

title: Bhel Puri
description: The most relished snack of all time for the Bhel Puri lover in you. Flavourful and Fresh.

title: Biguls
description: These conical crunchy bites make for an appetizing evening snack.

title: Ring
description: A classic masala flavored snack that leaves you craving for more.

title: Mast Pop
description: Low fat rice puffs coated in spices to tingle your taste buds.

title: Ring (Tomato)
description: It takes two to tango, and also to share a pack of Tangy Tomato Rings.

title: Ring (Pudina)
description: Ring in the snack time with the freshness of mint and a touch of spice.
